scripts.test-auth: NODE_ENV=test KAFKA=true MODEL_HOST=192.168.1.101 LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG API_URL=http://192.168.1.101:8080 KETO_URL=http://192.168.1.101:4466 HYDRA_URL=http://192.168.1.101:4444 OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL=http://192.168.1.101:4444/oauth2/token OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID=dcd-http-api OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET=introspection-secret mocha 'tests/*.test.js'
scripts.test-mysql: NODE_ENV=test KAFKA=true MODEL_HOST=192.168.1.101 LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG CRYPTO_KEY=cryptoKeyToChange node 'tests/MySQL.test.js'
scripts.test-service: NODE_ENV=test KAFKA=true MODEL_HOST=192.168.1.101 LOG_LEVEL=DEBUG CRYPTO_KEY=cryptoKeyToChange API_URL=http://192.168.1.101:8080 KETO_URL=http://192.168.1.101:4466 HYDRA_URL=http://192.168.1.101:4444 OAUTH2_TOKEN_URL=http://192.168.1.101:4444/oauth2/token OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID=dcd-http-api OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET=introspection-secret node 'tests/Service.test.js'
